text:
Written consent from a member's employer includes email communication.
Understand the difference between an additional compensation arrangement and a gift
from a client:
• If a client offers a bonus that depends on the future performance of her account, this
is an additional compensation arrangement that requires written consent in advance.
If a client offers a bonus to reward a member for her account's past performance, this
is a gift that requires disclosure to the member's employer to comply with Standard
I(B) Independence and Objectivity.
